thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: For Banks, This Volatility Is Too Much

author: Aaron Back
title: For Banks, This Volatility Is Too Much

organizations.name: this volatility is too much banking

text:
Banking stocks have been hit along with everything else the past couple days. Are investors making a mistake?
Banks tend to perform well during periods of higher interest rates and currency volatility. But extreme market volatility is good for no one. Bank shares recovered somewhat along with the rest of the market Tuesday, but over the past three trading days the KBW Nasdaq Bank Index has still fallen 5.1%, even greater than the 4.5% decline in the S&P 500.
...
